thread.title: Matt
thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by Matt

author: Matt
title: Matt
text: After ordering a pair of goggles direct from Oakley and them taking over a month with multiple phone calls only for my order to be cancelled. Within 15 minutes I had ordered the same pair from The Freeze Shop, received confirmation of my order and an estimated delivery time, Goggles arrived exactly as described on time! Hassle free shopping and would definetely use again and recommend!
